channel.title: Reflection - DJC (Acoustic!)
channel.description:
This is a new song made fully from guitars, strings, piano, melodic percussion, and a little bit of drum samples. NO Synths! If you guys could give it a listen or give any feedback, I'd be delighted! [https://soundcloud.com/djc_official/reflection](https://soundcloud.com/djc_official/reflection)
(This is an updated version based on some feedback I got a few days ago)

item.title: Reflection - DJC (Acoustic!)

item.description:
It’s back!! IF you guys could give a listen, that’d be awesome.
